SourceString:
If you'd like to take on a Maze Boss, I can send you to the Magic Maze!
Do you have a Maze Coin? Give Coin Explanation

If you'd like to take on a Maze Boss, I can send you to the Magic Maze!
...Oh? You have a guest. Since you have a guest, you can't battle. Finish your business, and come back again♪

If you'd like to take on a Maze Boss, I can send you to the Magic Maze!
...You don't have a Maze Coin. If you find a Maze Coin, bring it along♪

You'll pass?
When you do want to go to the Magic Maze,
come back again♪
<end>

Just a moment!
I feel a mysterious power from the adventurer!
It'd be good if you heard the story♪
Select a Maze Coin to use!\n<break>
Then I'll send you to the Magic Maze♪\nSee you laaater♪\n<end>

Would you like to hear about something again?
<select_se_off>
Magic Maze
Maze Coin
Boss Battles
<select_end><break>

In the Magic Maze, you can use Maze Coins to battle Maze Bosses!
When the battle ends, the adventurer is returned to their original world, so don't worry, ok♪

You can get Maze Coins from treasure chests and as tombola prizes.
If you have a Maze Coin and give it to me, I can send you to the Magic Maze.
「もし　迷宮の主に負けても 　Maze Coinは　失われないルン！
「だから　どんどん 　迷宮の主に　挑戦して欲しいルン！

Maze Bosses are awfully strong!
Beat them and you'll get something good, so keep at it♪

Would you like to hear about anything else?
<select_se_off>
Magic Maze
Maze Coin
Boss Battle
<select_end><break>

Welcome back♪
Looks like you successfully defeated the
Maze Boss!
<br_break>

That's unfortunate...
But you can keep fighting the Maze Boss, until you run out of Maze Coins, so keep at it!
...Huh? You don't have a Maze Coin to use.\nWhen you find a Maze Coin, come back again♪\n<end>
